articles.title: Elon Musk's Newest Cost-Cutting Measure To Avoid Twitter's "Bankruptcy" - NDTV
articles.description: Elon Musk's cost cutting measures at Twitter, to keep at bay the dark cloud of bankruptcy that looms over social media giant, now includes refusing to reimburse vendors expenses worth "millions of dollars" incurred before his takeover.
articles.content:
Twitter staff have since avoided the calls of the travel vendors. (File)
